snippet: A car struck a young woman and some children who were on a walk in Southampton Township, east of Philadelphia; she and two others were in critical condition.
abstract: New Jersey woman Jairisa Galindo is struck by car while walking with four children in Southampton Township, NJ; she and two children are injured and one child dies; police do not believe driver Thomas Xenakis Jr was speeding or intoxicated.
lead_paragraph: A car struck a young woman and some children who were on a walk in Southampton Township, east of Philadelphia; she and two others were in critical condition.

headline.main: Crash in Southern New Jersey Kills Boy, 2, and Injures 3 Others
headline.print_headline: Car Kills Boy in Red Wagon; Others Are Hurt
